benchmark_details.name: FinDKG (Financial Dynamic Knowledge Graph)
benchmark_details.overview: FinDKG is an open-source dynamic knowledge graph dataset created from financial news articles, used for detecting trends in financial markets.
benchmark_details.data_type: quintuples (entities, entity categories, relation types, timestamps)

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a dynamic knowledge graph for analyzing financial trends and facilitate thematic investing.

data.source: Financial news articles collected from the Wall Street Journal via open-source web archives.
data.annotation: Automated extraction of entities, relationships, and timestamps using the Integrated Contextual Knowledge Graph Generator (ICKG).

methodology.calculation: Performance is evaluated by calculating MRR and Hits metrics based on predicted link ranks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher values of MRR and Hits metrics indicate better model performance in link prediction tasks.
methodology.validation: Models utilized a validation set with early stopping mechanism to avoid overfitting.
